reporter_caption.center: EAST DIAMOND HEAD ASSOC. v. ZONING BD. OF APPEALS, 52 Haw. 572 (1971)

caption.center: EAST DIAMOND HEAD ASSOCIATION, A PRIVATE ORGANIZATION, ET AL., v. ZONING
BOARD OF APPEALS OF THE CITY AND COUNTY OF HONOLULU, ET AL.

opinion.panel: RICHARDSON, C.J., ABE, LEVINSON, KOBAYASHI, JJ., AND CIRCUIT JUDGE KABUTAN IN PLACE OF MARUMOTO, J., DISQUALIFIED.
opinion.opinion_text:
The petition for rehearing is denied without argument.
Circuit Judge Kabutan, who dissented from the majority in the original opinion, is now deceased.
opinion.attorneys: Arthur S.K. Fong for the petition.Page 573
